785090.name: Dark Flow
785090.description:
DARK FLOW is a Resident Evil inspired third person survival horror
Three bandits kidnaped a girl, bring her to an abandoned building andwait for a ransom, they chose the right victim but chose the wrong place. You take on the role of a father who prepared the money for his daughter but when he arrived at the building, he found blood everywhere and realized his money can't help in this situation.

The game uses tank controls, third person cinematic camera angles and is meant to be played with a controller. If you have a problem playing tank control games, you will not like this game.

Key Features:

  • Cinematic camera and tank controls.
  • Challenging enemies
  • Light puzzles element
  • Ps1 style low poly graphics.
  • It has no auto saves, you must save with special coins which are in limited supply.
  • Gore and bloody.
785090.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
